question_stem.en: A 22-year-old man comes to the office due to occasional dull headaches that awaken him from sleep. The patient has no associated neurologic deficits. There is no history of migraines in the family. His temperature is 37.2 C (99 F), blood pressure is 140/80 mm Hg, pulse is 60/min, and respirations are 12/min. On physical examination, there are several 3- to 5-cm flat, pigmented spots on his trunk. There are also multiple, subcentimeter, soft, fleshy, cutaneous tumors located on his trunk and neck. The predominant cells forming these tumors most likely originated from which of the following structures?
question_stem.zh: 一名22岁男性因偶尔的钝痛性头痛前来就诊，该头痛会将其从睡眠中痛醒。患者无相关神经功能缺损。家族史无偏头痛病史。体温37.2°C（99°F），血压140/80 mmHg，脉搏60次/分，呼吸12次/分。体格检查显示，躯干上有几个3-5cm的扁平色素斑。此外，在他的躯干和颈部还有多个直径小于1cm的柔软、肉质、皮肤肿瘤。形成这些肿瘤的主要细胞最有可能起源于以下哪种结构？

question.en: The predominant cells forming these tumors most likely originated from which of the following structures?
question.zh: 形成这些肿瘤的主要细胞最有可能起源于以下哪种结构？

explanation.en:
This patient has clinical features of NEUROFIBROMATOSIS TYPE I (von Recklinghausen disease), an autosomal dominant neurocutaneous disorder caused by mutations in the NF1 tumor suppressor gene. Patients typically develop hyperpigmented macules (Café-au-lait spots) over the trunk soon after birth and are at increased risk of developing central nervous system neoplasms (eg, optic gliomas, pilocytic astrocytomas), which can cause elevated intracranial pressure and headache.

Cutaneous neurofibromas usually manifest during early adolescence as multiple, raised, fleshy tumors (<2 cm) that often increase in size and number with age. These are benign nerve sheath neoplasms predominantly comprised of SCHWANN CELLS, which are embryologically derived from the NEURAL CREST.

(Choice A) The endoderm gives rise to thyroid follicular cells (derived from the primitive tongue) and the epithelial linings of the gastrointestinal tract, middle ear, lungs, bladder, and most of the urethra. It also gives rise to the bulk of the liver and pancreas, as these structures form from outpouchings of the primitive gut tube.

(Choice B) The mesoderm is divided into paraxial, intermediate, and lateral sections and gives rise to muscles, bones, blood, connective tissue, dermis, and the kidneys/ureters.

(Choice D) The neural tube gives rise to neurons of the central nervous system and the neurohypophysis, retina, pineal gland, preganglionic autonomic fibers, astrocytes, and ependymal cells.

(Choice E) The notochord almost completely regresses in humans, and its only major derivative is the nucleus pulposus of the intervertebral disc. Vertebrae are derived from the paraxial mesoderm.

(Choice F) The surface ectoderm gives rise to the epidermis, lens of the eye, outer layer of the cornea, nasal and oral epithelium, and anal epithelium below the dentate line.

Educational objective:
Neurofibromatosis type I (von Recklinghausen disease) is an autosomal dominant disorder caused by mutations in the NF1 tumor suppressor gene. Patients characteristically develop numerous cutaneous neurofibromas comprised mostly of Schwann cells, which are embryologically derived from the neural crest.
explanation.zh:
该患者具有神经纤维瘤病 I 型（von Recklinghausen 病）的临床特征，这是一种常染色体显性遗传神经皮肤病，由 NF1 肿瘤抑制基因的突变引起。患者通常在出生后不久会在躯干上出现色素沉着斑（牛奶咖啡斑），并且患中枢神经系统肿瘤（例如，视神经胶质瘤，毛细胞星形细胞瘤）的风险增加，这可能导致颅内压升高和头痛。

皮肤神经纤维瘤通常在青春期早期表现为多个隆起、肉质肿瘤（<2 cm），其大小和数量通常随年龄增长而增加。这些是良性神经鞘肿瘤，主要由施万细胞组成，这些细胞在胚胎学上源自神经嵴。

（选项 A）内胚层产生甲状腺滤泡细胞（源自原始舌）以及胃肠道、中耳、肺、膀胱和大多数尿道的上皮内衬。它也产生肝脏和胰腺的大部分，因为这些结构由原始肠管的向外突出部分形成。

（选项 B）中胚层分为轴旁、中间和侧部，并产生肌肉、骨骼、血液、结缔组织、真皮以及肾脏/输尿管。

（选项 D）神经管产生中枢神经系统的神经元和神经垂体、视网膜、松果体、节前自主神经纤维、星形胶质细胞和室管膜细胞。

（选项 E）脊索在人类中几乎完全退化，其唯一的主要衍生物是椎间盘的髓核。椎骨来源于轴旁中胚层。

（选项 F）表面外胚层产生表皮、眼晶状体、角膜外层、鼻和口腔上皮以及齿状线下方的肛门上皮。

教育目标：
神经纤维瘤病 I 型（von Recklinghausen 病）是一种常染色体显性遗传疾病，由 NF1 肿瘤抑制基因的突变引起。患者特征性地出现许多皮肤神经纤维瘤，主要由施万细胞组成，这些细胞在胚胎学上源自神经嵴。

summary.en:
This question tests the understanding of the embryologic origin of cutaneous neurofibromas, a hallmark of Neurofibromatosis Type I. It requires correlating clinical findings with specific germ layer derivatives.

To solve this question, identify the likely diagnosis based on the clinical presentation (café-au-lait spots and cutaneous tumors). Recall or refer to embryologic charts to determine the origin of Schwann cells, which form neurofibromas, and match this to the provided options.
summary.zh:
本题考察对皮肤神经纤维瘤的胚胎学起源的理解，这是神经纤维瘤病 I 型的标志。它需要将临床发现与特定的胚层衍生物相关联。

要解决这个问题，请根据临床表现（牛奶咖啡斑和皮肤肿瘤）确定可能的诊断。回忆或参考胚胎学图表，确定形成神经纤维瘤的施万细胞的起源，并将其与提供的选项进行匹配。
